page.title: 18Friends of Cannock Chase.
page.content: The Association of the Friends of Cannock Chase is about 50 years old. There are about 350 members at present. Its aims are the preservation and protection of Cannock Chase for use by the public. Three of their achievements have been 1) Stopping of military use of the land, 2) Stopping the construction of a motorway, 3) Stopping the extension of gravel extraction. The Association holds regular meetings, arranges walks on the Chase and visits local places of interest. The Society badge is the Staffordshire Knot and above it a leaping deer. The present Society Secretary visited our school to tell us about the Association.
